item.title: dingbot
item.author: serialt
item.description: 钉钉机器人 一、shell脚本 1、基于关键字或者 ip 版 发送txt格式消息 info='hello' logFile='/var/log/dingbot.log' #发送消息 sendMsg() { token='1e18ffe069052b56f5a0f8fe9b6c058373e7df7ef4xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx' result=$(curl -s "https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=$token" \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \ -d "{'msgtype': 'text','text': {'content': 'msg:\n$*'}}") [ $(echo $result | grep "errmsg.*ok") ] && echo 'send succees!' echo "$(date
